params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the Blip text model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented bythe inputs_ids passed when calling BlipModel.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: encoder_hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers from the vision model.

params.name: intermediate_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the intermediate (i.e., feed-forward) layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: max_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder and pooler. If string, gelu,relu, selu and gelu_new gelu are supported.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: hidden_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: attention_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: bos_token_id
params.description: The id of the beginning-of-sequence token.

params.name: eos_token_id
params.description: The id of the end-of-sequence token.

params.name: pad_token_id
params.description: The id of the padding token.

params.name: sep_token_id
params.description: The id of the separator token.

params.name: is_decoder
params.description: Whether the model is used as a decoder.

params.name: use_cache
params.description: Whether or not the model should return the last key/values attentions (not used by all models).

params.name: label_smoothing
params.description: A float in [0.0, 1.0]. Specifies the amount of smoothing when computing the loss, where 0.0 means no smoothing. The targetsbecome a mixture of the original ground truth and a uniform distribution as described inRethinking the Inception Architecture for Computer Vision <https://arxiv.org/abs/1512.00567>__. Default: :math:0.0.
